help.title: Help
help.development_description: Use the arrow icon right next to the app bar to go back.

map.title: Rive
map.connection_required: Internet connection is required to show scooters on map.
map.location_permission_required: We need your location to show scooters on map.
map.camera_permission_required: Camera permission is required to scan the QR code.
map.qr_incorrect_format: Incorrect format or nothing was detected. Please try again!
map.qr_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while using the scanner. If this problem persists contact support!
map.qr_success_description: Make sure you want to ride this scooter and proceed by pressing ride. Otherwise press cancel to cancel the ride!

register.email_format_text: Email field must be an email.
register.password1_min_text: Password field must be at least 8 characters long.
register.password2_required_text: Verify password field cannot be empty.

review.title: Review
review.no_review: Don't want to submit a review?

settings.title: Settings
settings.development_description: Use the arrow icon right next to the app bar to go back.

splash.location_permission_required: We need your location to show scooters on map.

share_code.title: Get Free Credits
